00001 #ifndef _BAYES_FILTER_CI
00002 #define _BAYES_FILTER_CI

00012 
00013 /*
00014  * Covariance Intersection Filter Scheme.
00015  *
00016  * References
00017  *  [1] "A Non divergent Estimation Algorithm in the Presence of Unknown Correlations"
00018  *   Simon J Julier, Jeffrey K Uhlmann
00019  *
00020  * CI provides a generalised consistent method to combine mean and covariances
00021  * of two estimates. The combination can be optimised by chosing a norm of the
00022  * combined correlations. The norm (omega) is restrict to 0..1 inclusive an effectively
00023  * scales the combination
00024  * Here is CI with a predict and obeserve model to form a filter.
00025  *
00026  * The Omega norm chosen here is the fixed value of 0.5
00027  * The Omega function should be overloaded to produce more useful results
00028  *
00029  * The filter is operated by performing a
00030  *  predict, observe
00031  * cycle derived from the Extended_filter
00032  */
00033 #include "bayesFlt.hpp"
00034 
00035 /* Filter namespace */
00036 namespace Bayesian_filter
00037 {
00038 
00039 class CI_scheme : public Extended_kalman_filter
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     CI_scheme (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t z_initialsize = 0);
00043     CI_scheme& operator= (const CI_scheme&);
00044     // Optimise copy assignment to only copy filter state
00045 
00046     void init ();
00047     void update ();
00048     Float predict (Linrz_predict_model& f);
00049     Float observe_innovation (Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& s);
00050     Float observe_innovation (Linrz_correlated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& s);
00051 
00052     virtual Float Omega(const FM::SymMatrix& Ai, const FM::SymMatrix& Bi, const FM::SymMatrix& A)
00053     // Determine norm Omega 0..1 for the CI combination
00054     // Default norm is the fixed value 0.5
00055     {
00056         return 0.5;
00057     }
00058 
00059 public:                     // Exposed Numerical Results
00060     FM::SymMatrix S, SI;        // Innovation Covariance and Inverse
00061 
00062 protected:                  // allow fast operation if z_size remains constant
00063     std::size_t last_z_size;
00064     void observe_size (std::size_t z_size);
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 }//namespace
00069 #endif
